name: Beta Onboarding Wizard
description: Interactive 4-step post-accept onboarding wizard. Two-column layout (40% form, 60% contextual preview). Step 1: About You with AI chat preview. Step 2: Your Company with live sidebar preview. Step 3: Your Fundraise (skippable) with pipeline preview. Step 4: Get Started action cards. Full step navigation, working chat, live-updating previews.

versions.notes: Full interactive flow with working chat, live sidebar preview, pill toggles, and action cards. Sana AI-inspired two-column layout with progress dots.
